channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-15982] 'Quickstarts Java nightly end-to-end test' is failed on travis
item.description:
==============================================================================
Running 'Quickstarts Java nightly end-to-end test'
==============================================================================

Flink dist directory: /home/travis/build/apache/flink/flink-dist/target/flink-1.11-SNAPSHOT-bin/flink-1.11-SNAPSHOT

item.summary: 'Quickstarts Java nightly end-to-end test' is failed on travis

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
I ran into the issue as well. I believe the problem is this change: https://github.com/apache/flink/commit/2b28169646c75327b05108198ea27af009d40a29#diff-aa05a351945a1297c1a64f9809632a3a combined with this line in the common.sh script:

FLINK_VERSION=$(cat ${END_TO_END_DIR}/pom.xml | sed -n 's/.*<version>\(.*\)<\/version>/\1/p')

In the quickstart test, FLINK_VERSION is set to:

2020-02-11T23:04:18.3614598Z ++ FLINK_VERSION='1.11-SNAPSHOT
2020-02-11T23:04:18.3615067Z 1.8.1
2020-02-11T23:04:18.3615489Z 2.5.9'

So above sed is extracting all versions in the end to end pom. I'll assign myself to this ticket & will provide a fix.

I need to reopen this ticket. The test is still failing in the latest master: https://travis-ci.org/apache/flink/jobs/650817656

I forgot to export the FLINK_VERSION.
This will be fixed in this PR: https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/10976/
Should be fixed now in https://github.com/apache/flink/commit/84fd23d82c2908192d58186d6e061c89b018cda5#diff-6f9df16a3c581688cde52134ef1e83edR22
